issue.title: [Java] arrow-jdbc module is missing required files/dirs on GitHub
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2736](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2736). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The **adapter/jdbc/** module is failing with the following error during checkstyle verification. Required folders & files are missing from GitHub.

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-checkstyle-plugin:2.17:check (validate) on project arrow-jdbc: Failed during checkstyle execution: Unable to find suppressions file at location: dev/checkstyle/suppressions.xml: Could not find resource 'dev/checkstyle/suppressions.xml'.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2736?focusedCommentId=16521970) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This file is definitely there. I think the build system is having an issue because of the extra level of directory nesting. Can you submit a patch to fix?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2736?focusedCommentId=16522253) by Aravind R Yarram (aravind.yarram):*
